author: stoddard
msg: Make CACHE_IN and CACHE_CONDITIONAL AP_FTYPE_CONTENT filters.  Comtemplating
making a new filter type, AP_FTYPE_CACHE.  We need to run CACHE_IN immediately
after the handlers are done and before we run the content through any filters.

author: stoddard
msg: Ooops, this should have been committed along with mod_mem_cache changes.
Keep track of the number of body bytes written to the cache.

author: stoddard
msg: 2. Enable cacheing content contained in multiple brigades
3. Don't cache an entry more than once.

author: dougm
msg: require newer lwp for http/1.1 + https
default to http/1.0 (newer lwp has changed default to 1.1)

author: jwoolley
msg: Update the comments regarding -DONE_PROCESS and -DNO_DETACH since
